name: Golbat

attacks.name: Leech Life
attacks.text: Remove a number of damage counters from Golbat equal to the damage done to the Defending Pok√©mon (after applying Weakness and Resistance). If Golbat has fewer damage counters than that, remove all of them.

flavorText: Once it strikes, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.

strengths: Wing Attack is efficient at 30 for 2 colorless
weaknesses: Leech Life's healing often less valuable than more damage

competitiveHistory: Golbat was a decent Uncommon with its efficient Wing Attack and free retreat, but its low HP and Psychic weakness limited its competitive use. Leech Life's healing was rarely impactful enough to matter.

rulings.ruling: Leech Life's healing is calculated after Weakness and Resistance are applied to the damage.
If Leech Life does 40 damage due to Weakness, Golbat heals 40 damage.
